forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow after 4pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 42. South southwest wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Light Snow then Chance Rain Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow before 10pm, then a chance of rain showers. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 34. South wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely. Cloudy, with a high near 47. South wind 6 to 9 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers. Cloudy, with a low around 41. Southeast wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 37. Southwest wind 5 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Freezing Rain then Light Rain Likely
forecast.detailedForecast: Freezing rain between 10pm and midnight, then rain likely. Mostly cloudy. Low around 31, with temperatures rising to around 34 overnight. South wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain. Cloudy, with a high near 39. South wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%.

forecast.name: Tuesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain. Cloudy, with a low around 35. East wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 38. Southwest wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Freezing Rain then Chance Light Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: Freezing rain between 10pm and midnight, then a chance of rain. Mostly cloudy. Low around 29, with temperatures rising to around 33 overnight. Southwest wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely. Cloudy. High near 40, with temperatures falling to around 38 in the afternoon. South wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.

forecast.name: Tuesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain. Cloudy, with a low around 35. Southeast wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

sections.content: Bucks Run 2.5 km ski trail will be groomed for classic and skate ski today, March 2, 2025. There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run or annual permits are available for $125. Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails.

sections.header: Natural Snow Classic and Skate Ski Trails
sections.content: –  Due to the warm, rainy weather, trails have deteriorated and are not suitable for skiing.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Cross Country Ski center closed for the season.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Was skiing classical with waxless (fish scale) skis.  Tracks where in surprisingly good shape.  Tracks were set for the entire length of Buck's Run  including connector.  Quite a few skaters out---seemed like they were going a little slower than usual.    Many Kudos to the groomers!

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Red and Blue loops are hard packed and fast with a light skiff of new . There is some wind debris: but no more than minor agility training . LF 7

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 5  lifts, the Space Worm, and the Rope Tow
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails were groomed and tracked on Saturday. Conditions are very good.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM.
nubsNob.comments: The sun is out, the wind is light and the temperature is comfortable for skiing. The coverage on slopes continues to be very good with excellent grooming from our dedicated Crew. The XC trails and snowshoe trails still have plenty of natural snow. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with a deli and an espresso bar. The lifts will spin from 9 AM to 4:30 PM today. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
